overview.summary: Create an averaged scalar field over time.

description.p: This module, in cooperation with TimeStepSelector and ScalarFieldExtractor, outputs the average of multiple scalar fields over time. To use, connect the TimeStepSelector to the ScalarFieldExtractor and the latter to this module. Increment the timestep. As the timestep increases the field produced will be averaged with the previous fields. If the timestep decreases, the averaging begins anew.
